name: Auth
desc: The Auth class provides methods for user authentication and access to user-related information.

name: authStateChanges
desc: A stream that emits changes in the authentication state, such as when a user signs in or signs out.

name: changeUserEmail
desc: Changes the user's email.

name: createUserWithEmailAndPassword
desc: Creates a new user account with the provided email and password.

name: currentUser
desc: Returns the currently authenticated user, or null if there is no authenticated user.

name: deleteUser
desc: Deletes the current user from Firebase Authentication.

name: forceRetrieveUser
desc: Forces the retrieval of user data.

name: retrieveUser
desc: Retrieves the user data.

name: sendPasswordResetEmail
desc: Sends a password reset email to the user associated with the provided email. The user will receive an email containing instructions to reset their password.

name: signInWithEmailAndPassword
desc: Signs in the user with the provided email and password.

name: signOut
desc: Signs out the currently authenticated user.

name: AuthBinding

name: App
desc:
The App widget is a StatelessWidget that returns a GetMaterialApp widget.
The GetMaterialApp widget is a MaterialApp widget that uses the Get package for state management.
It defines the initial route of the application, the default transition animation, the pages of the application,
the initial binding, the smart management strategy, the title of the application, the theme of the application,
and the builder for the EasyLoading widget.

name: build
desc:
Builds the  GetMaterialApp widget with a MaterialApp widget that uses the Get package for state management.
It defines the initial route of the application, the default transition animation, the pages of the application,
the initial binding, the smart management strategy, the title of the application, the theme of the application,
and the builder for the EasyLoading widget.

name: AppTabBar
desc: The AppTabBar class custom tab bar widget that displays a list of screens and allows the user to switch between them.

name: AppTabBar
desc: Constructs a new instance of the AppTabBar class with the specified parameters.

name: build
desc: Builds the app tab bar widget using a PersistentTabView widget.

name: controller
desc: The controller parameter is the controller to use for the tab bar.

name: currentItemColor
desc: The currentItemColor parameter is the color to use for the currently selected screen.

name: onItemSelected
desc: The onItemSelected parameter is a function to call when the user selects a screen.

name: screens
desc: The screens parameter is a list of widgets to display as screens in the tab bar.

name: values
desc: A constant List of the values in this enum, in order of their declaration.

name: CustomTextField
desc: The CustomTextField class custom text field widget that can be used to read text inputs from a keyboard.

name: CustomTextField
desc: Constructs a new instance of the CustomTextField class with the specified parameters.

name: build
desc: Builds a TextFormField widget with the specified properties.

name: errorText
desc: The errorText parameter is the text to display as an error message if the input is invalid.

name: initialValue
desc: The initialValue parameter is the initial value to display in the text field.

name: isPassword
desc: The isPassword parameter is a boolean value that determines whether the text field should display the input as a password.

name: labelText
desc: The labelText parameter is the text to display as the label for the text field.

name: onChanged
desc: The onChanged parameter is a function to call when the input value changes.

name: EditProfileTextField
desc: The EditProfileTextField class custom text field widget that can be used to edit profile information.

name: EditProfileTextField
desc: Constructs a new instance of the EditProfileTextField class with the specified parameters.

name: build
desc: Builds a TextFormField widget with the specified properties for editing profile information.

name: errorText
desc: The errorText parameter is the text to display as an error message if the input is invalid.

name: initialValue
desc: The initialValue parameter is the initial value to display in the text field.

name: labelText
desc: The labelText parameter is the text to display as the label for the text field.

name: onChanged
desc: The onChanged parameter is a function to call when the input value changes.

name: HundoptUser
desc:
The HundoptUser class models a Hundopt user object.
Hundopt users will be default client users that can use the app

name: HundoptUser
desc: Constructs a new instance of the HundoptUser class with the specified parameters.

name: adoptingDogs
desc: The IDs of the dogs the user is adopting.

name: email
desc: The email of the user.

name: HundoptUser.empty
desc: Creates an empty HundoptUser object.

name: favDogs
desc: The IDs of the user's favorite dogs.

name: favShelters
desc: The IDs of the user's favorite shelters.

name: HundoptUser.fromJson
desc: Creates a HundoptUser object from a JSON-compatible Map.

name: fullName
desc: The full name of the user.

name: id
desc: The ID of the user.

name: personalityFormID
desc: The ID of the personality form of the user.

name: phone
desc: The phone number of the user.

name: pictureURL
desc: The URL of the picture of the user.

name: username
desc: The username of the user.

name: HundoptUser.withEmailAndUsername
desc: Constructs a new instance of HundoptUser with the given parameters.

name: UserManager
desc: The UserManager class provides utility methods for managing the current user.

name: getUser
desc: Returns the current user.

name: setUser
desc: Sets the current user.

name: UserRepository
desc: The UserRepository class provides methods for managing personality form documents in Firestore.

name: addAdoptingDog
desc: Adds a dog to a user's adopting dogs list in Firestore.

name: addFavDog
desc: Adds a dog to a user's favorite dogs list in Firestore.

name: addFavShelter
desc: Adds a shelter to a user's favorite shelters list in Firestore.

name: createUser
desc: Creates a new user in Firestore.

name: getUser
desc: Retrieves a user from Firestore.

name: removeAdoptingDog
desc: Removes a dog from a user's adopting dogs list in Firestore.

name: removeFavDog
desc: Removes a dog from a user's favorite dogs list in Firestore.

name: removeFavShelter
desc: Removes a shelter from a user's favorite shelters list in Firestore.

name: updatePictureURL
desc: Updates the picture URL of a user in Firestore.

name: updateUser
desc: Updates a user's information in Firestore.

name: uploadImage
desc: Uploads an image to Firebase Storage.

name: usersCollection
desc: Collection reference to the 'users' collection in Firestore.

name: UserSingleton
desc: The UserSingleton class stores the current user.

name: UserSingleton
desc: Returns the instance of the UserSingleton class.

name: userData
desc: The current user.

name: Validations
desc: The Validations class provides utility methods for validating user input.

name: hasCountryCode
desc: Returns true if the given val has a country code.

name: isValidEmail
desc: Returns true if the given val is a valid email address.

name: isValidNumber
desc: Returns true if the given val is a valid phone number.

name: isValidPassword
desc: Returns true if the given val is a valid password.

name: isValidUsername
desc: Returns true if the given val is a valid username.

name: lengthOK
desc: Returns true if the length of the given val is greater than or equal to minLen.
